definition: to be located at/to be situated in
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

sentences.english: Niujuanhu oilfield is located in Santanhu basin, with complicated geology conditions.
sentences.chinese: 地处三塘湖盆地的牛圈湖油田，地质条件比较复杂。

sentences.english: This site is located slightly north from the centre of the Hetao plain on the northern edge of the Xixia (Tangut) domain.
sentences.chinese: 该遗址位于河套平原中部偏北，地处西夏国的北部。

sentences.english: Unfortunately a lot of people still don't know where it is.
sentences.chinese: 但遗憾的是，仍有很多人不知道香港地处何方。

sentences.english: Hubei province, located in the middle of the borderland referred to in dongting lake and hubei.
sentences.chinese: 湖北简称，地处我国中部，以居洞庭湖北而得名。

sentences.english: A sport similar to the handball, called croquet, originally existed in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 地处中欧的德国原有类似手球的活动，称为门球。

sentences.english: Shangluo city is among the mountains, the issue of the peasants' religious beliefs is always serious.
sentences.chinese: 商洛地处深山，农民宗教信仰问题一直十分突出。

sentences.english: Dunhuang in China, deep in the heart of the Gebi Desert, was once a great city.
sentences.chinese: 中国的敦煌，地处戈壁沙漠的腹地，曾经是个大都市。

sentences.english: Office Building of Century Group is situated at the junction of Xingang Road and the 3rd Street downtown Tanggu.
sentences.chinese: 世纪集团办公楼地处塘沽中心区新港路与三号路交口。

sentences.english: Guyuan region, a well known poor region, is in the south of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region of China.
sentences.chinese: 固原地区地处宁夏南部，是全国著名的贫困地区。

sentences.english: The remoteness of Qinghai Province has made it the site of many prison camps.
sentences.chinese: 青海省地区因地处偏远成为监狱营区用地。

sentences.english: Hubei is shorted for Hubei, is situated at middle our country, occupies the Tungting lake Hubei to acquire fame.
sentences.chinese: 湖北简称鄂，地处我国中部，以居洞庭湖北而得名。

sentences.english: China Building Ceramic Capital is located in Foshan City, Guangdong Province, the famous ceramic production enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 地处中国建陶之都广东省佛山市，著名陶瓷生产企业。

sentences.english: The Middle East is located in the junction of Europe, Asia and Africa.
sentences.chinese: 中东地处欧亚非三大洲交接处，战略地位十分重要。

sentences.english: Lishui Town, is located in the hilly areas Whitehead, fertile land.
sentences.chinese: 白石水镇地处丘陵地带，土地肥沃。

sentences.english: Xianfeng Temple is located in the Mid Emei , Guro -dong, about ten minutes away from the distance .
sentences.chinese: 仙峰寺地处峨嵋半山，离九老洞约十分钟的路程。

definition: to be right next to/close neighbor
to be located at/to be situated at/to lie
to be situated/to be located (of a building)
to be situated/located at (of building)/also written 坐落[zuo4 luo4]
